home.title: Tools
home.meta_description: A collection of useful developer tools like JSON formatter, Base64 converter, and more.

json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter
json-formatter.error_unknown: An unknown error occurred while parsing JSON.

character-counter.name: Character Counter
character-counter.description: Count characters, words, and lines in text.
character-counter.label: Enter your text here

qr-code-generator.name: QR Code Generator
qr-code-generator.description: Generate QR codes from text or URLs.

unix-timestamp.name: Unix Timestamp
unix-timestamp.description: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates.

color-converter.name: Color Converter
color-converter.description: Convert between HEX and RGB color codes.

markdown-previewer.name: Markdown Previewer
markdown-previewer.description: Edit and preview Markdown text in real-time.
markdown-previewer.initial_markdown:
# Welcome to my Markdown Previewer! ## This is a sub-heading... ### And here's some other cool stuff: Heres some code, `
`, between 2 backticks. ``` // this is multi-line code: function anotherExample(firstLine, lastLine) { if (firstLine == '```' && lastLine == '```') { return multiLineCode; } } ``` You can also make text **bold**... whoa! Or _italic_. Or... wait for it... **_both!_** And feel free to go crazy ~~crossing stuff out~~. There's also [links](https://www.freecodecamp.org), and > Block Quotes! And if you want to get really crazy, even tables: Wild Header | Crazy Header | Another Header? ------------ | ------------- | ------------- Your content can | be here, and it | can be here.... And here. | Okay. | I think we get it. - And of course there are lists. - Some are bulleted. - With different indentation levels. - That look like this.

jwt-decoder.name: JWT Decoder
jwt-decoder.description: Decode JSON Web Tokens and view their contents.

hash-generator.name: Hash Generator
hash-generator.description: Generate various hash digests (SHA-1, SHA-256, etc.).

time-zone-converter.name: Time Zone Converter
time-zone-converter.description: Compare and check the time in multiple cities around the world.

ip-address-viewer.name: IP Address Viewer
ip-address-viewer.description: Display your public IP address and browser information (User Agent).

keyboard-event-viewer.name: Keyboard Event Viewer
keyboard-event-viewer.description: Display information about pressed keyboard keys (key, code, keyCode, etc.).
keyboard-event-viewer.info_will_be_displayed: The key event information will be displayed below.

lorem-ipsum-generator.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
lorem-ipsum-generator.description: Generate dummy text for your designs.

text-sorter.name: Text Sorter
text-sorter.description: Sort, reverse, and remove duplicate lines from text.

slug-generator.name: Slug Generator
slug-generator.description: Convert text into a URL-friendly slug.
